definition: a support projecting from a wall (as to hold a shelf), to classify or group
details:
noun
- a support projecting from a wall (as to hold a shelf)
= synonyms: wall bracket
- either of two punctuation marks ([ or ]) used to enclose textual material
= synonyms: square bracket
- either of two punctuation marks (`<' or `>') used in computer programming and sometimes used to enclose textual material
= synonyms: angle bracket
- a category falling within certain defined limits
verb
- to classify or group
= example: to classify or group
- to support with brackets
= example: to support with brackets
